ygData.subject: Re: Searching in OOT, just sharks so far...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know. Again, as I said, it s all RUMOR and that I haven t verified it either way. Did I stress that this was rumor? No? Ok. This is rumor.
ygData.messageBody:

it either way. Did I stress that this was rumor? No? Ok. This is rumor.
